ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Done'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Cancelled'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Discard'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Reject')), OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Classification__c)),ISBLANK(TEXT(Sub_Class__c)),ISBLANK(TEXT(Detail_Class__c))), OR(OwnerId = '00G30000002qI7d',OwnerId = '00Ga0000002tw4B', OwnerId = '00G30000002qOJD', OwnerId = '00G30000002qI6p', OwnerId = '00G30000002qI6z'), $RecordType.Name = 'Weather Information Service', $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - RFQ (US)', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User', $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE', $Profile.Name !='DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser',$Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot Closed or Assigned to GDC Queues If Classification,Sub Class and Detail Class are Blank
